timeline.message:
toast and tutorial things

just figured i'd throw this in

timeline.bodyText: Are you sure that when the error methods are called, the object itself errors with the given message than listen to error from other things?
timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Yes, that's exactly what I was thinking about that name. In one of my enigma branches I have a Validatable class because I added a validation framework, which does something very similar as far this as I can see, but it has the slight difference in meaning that it doesn't create the errors itself. That might actually be a good name for this interface. Or ErrorReceiver as in my PR but I still think that name is also kinda meh, definitely better than Errable though, imo.
replies.author: 2xsaiko

replies.bodyText: In fact Errable is the right name, as this object has the error when the error method is called. Imo error should be like errored instead
replies.author: liach
